page.title: 08A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: A typical day for me starts at 6.45.My husband is always the first out of bed he goes downstairs and makes a pot of tea whilst I try and rouse my two children.After we have all got dreesed we go downstairs and have breakfast.I am a teacher,my children leave for school with me.My day at work begins at work with the register and finding out who will be staying for dinner.I spend my day with a class of 9 and 10 year olds, we do a variety of things. Louise l tell you what we do. We do different work each day such as Maths, English, Handwriting, and Art and Craft,Geography,Science and a project which we choose ourselves.On some afternoons we can choose what we want to do.On Monday,Wednesday and Friday we have games,in the summer we have rounders on the field.
